attributes.additional_details: Because dogs shouldn’t be banned people who choose for the dogs to fight will find another breed to do so with it’s not the dogs fault it’s trained that way it’s the owner every dog is dangerous if provoked or trained that way don’t punish the good dogs
attributes.background: Re consider the ban for xl Bully’s not all dogs are bad it’s how they are raised and trained hold the owner responsible all dogs are dangerous not just xl bully’s

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

We also cannot publish petitions that do not include a full name.
